programme.title: Origin of Monogamy
programme.desc: To cure Sun-Ae's misandry, mental counselor Sung-hae intentionally lets her junior Sun-Ae to meet a man.

programme.title: Innocent Thing
programme.desc: A high school student develops a crush on her gym teacher.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune-teller go through hell to find a missing girl and bring her back home alive.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: So-Jin, Dong-hyuk and Hye-Rin are complete strangers. They wake up and find themselves locked up side by side.

programme.title: One-Line
programme.desc: A young hustler joins a group of professional con artists to begin a career in loan brokerage. The field is dangerous, especially when you can't trust the other players.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: Rival precinct chiefs race to catch a serial rapist in 2 weeks and win the 'Officer of the Year' title.

programme.title: Lovers' Concerto
programme.desc: Ji-hwan, a college student, befriends two cute girls his age. Over the years, he loses contact with them and learns a surprising secret about the two.

programme.title: The Girl on A Bulldozer
programme.desc: A single father gets into a mysterious car accident, leaving Hye-yeong and her young brother all alone.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie (G.I. Joe's Byung-Hun Lee)
programme.desc: South Korean National Security Service normally deals with North Korea, but now NSS must deal with IRIS terrorists with a nuke.

programme.title: The Huntresses
programme.desc: Joseon's best bounty hunter, Jin-ok, takes on a high-reward case, unaware it points to her father's killer.

programme.title: The Hill Of Secrets
programme.desc: 12-year-old Myung-eun, deeply sensitive, discovers herself and family through the healing power of writing.

programme.title: The Concubine
programme.desc: Hwa-yeon, a concubine, faces palace danger after the king's death. A bloody fate awaits all within the palace.
